commands.noApiKeyHint: API Key not configured, click to configure
menus.noApiKeyHint: API Key not configured, click to configure
config.initialization.title: PawSQL Initialization
config.initialization.description: Basic initialization settings for PawSQL extension
config.initialization.apiKey.description: API key for authenticating with PawSQL services
config.initialization.apiKey.markdownDes: API key used for authenticating with PawSQL services. You can get this from your PawSQL account settings.
config.initialization.backendUrl.descrip: URL of the PawSQL backend service
config.initialization.backendUrl.markdow: The base URL for PawSQL backend service.
config.initialization.frontendUrl.descri: URL of the PawSQL frontend service
config.initialization.frontendUrl.markdo: The base URL for PawSQL frontend service.
config.workspace.title: PawSQL Workspace Configuration
config.workspace.default.title: Default Workspace
config.workspace.default.markdownDescrip: Configure the default workspace that will be used when opening new files
config.workspace.default.workspaceId.des: Unique identifier for the default workspace
config.workspace.default.workspaceId.mar: A unique identifier that represents your default workspace
config.workspace.default.workspaceName.m: Display name for your default workspace
config.workspace.default.dbType.markdown: The type of database used in this workspace (e.g., MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite)
config.workspace.default.dbHost.markdown: The host address where your database is running
config.workspace.default.dbPort.markdown: The port number on which your database is listening
config.workspace.recent.title: Recent Workspaces
config.workspace.recent.markdownDescript: Maintains a list of your recently accessed workspaces
config.workspace.recent.item.title: Workspace Entry
config.workspace.recent.workspaceId.mark: A unique identifier that represents this workspace
config.workspace.recent.dbType.markdownD: The type of database used in this workspace
config.workspace.recent.dbHost.markdownD: The host address where this workspace's database is running
config.workspace.recent.dbPort.markdownD: The port number on which this workspace's database is listening
config.workspace.fileMapping.title: File Workspace Mapping
config.workspace.fileMapping.markdownDes: Configure which workspace should be used for specific files or file patterns
views.welcome.noConfiguration:
$(gear) No configuration found.

[Configure Now](command:pawsql.openSettings)

Click to setup your configuration.
views.welcome.noWorkspace:
No workspace found.

[Create Now](command:pawsql.createWorkspace)

Click to create your workspace.
